name: Speed Trap
overview: Catch speeding cars with your radar gun, but don't let them see you until the very last moment. Your assignment trooper is to patrol interstate I-695. Where you will be on the lookout for all those reckless idiotic highway death merchants (ten/four!!) you will promptly zap them with radar to slow them down cand score) but if you hit a good citizen, you will be penalized close points) due to the sneaky nature of those death merchants they will not appear until you are parked behind the barricade at left. They will also increase speed as your score increases. Good luck, trooper!
